snippet: A student opened fire at an Atlanta middle school on Thursday afternoon, wounding a 14-year-old in the neck before an armed officer working there was able to wrest the gun away, the police said.
abstract: Police say student opened fire at Atlanta middle school, wounding 14-year-old in the neck before an armed officer working there was able to wrest gun away.
lead_paragraph: A student opened fire at an Atlanta middle school on Thursday afternoon, wounding a 14-year-old in the neck before an armed officer working there was able to wrest the gun away, the police said.

headline.main: Georgia: Student Wounded in Middle School Shooting
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Student Wounded In Middle School Shooting
